reviews.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars The Perfect Balance Between Audio and Aesthetic Quality
reviews.author: Amazon Customer
reviews.content: I have owned many different units at this price range over the years and I am very impressed by this speaker. The sound stage of those speaker fills the room while maintaining a fairly level volume across the area. This is excellent for dinner parties because the it prevents the people near my bar (where I have the speaker) from getting their ears blasted out so the people in the living room can hear. The battery life is easily 9 or so hours on medium volume.The one con with this speaker is there is it appears to have only three main volume levels: soft, medium, loud. It does not get very loud. As you scroll the volume knob on the speaker you will have several regions where there is little perceivable increase before the next volume level is reached.Despite strange idiosyncrasies in the volume leveling, the sound fidelity of the speaker is great! It's not quite the same level as some speakers I've had ranging in the $3-500 range, but hey you're getting close at a fraction of the price! The build quality of the speaker is also impressive and I get compliments on it all the time! 10/10 have recommended to my friends. You won't regret this purchase!
reviews.timestamp: Reviewed in the United States August 22, 2022

reviews.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great audio, great aesthetics, weird Bluetooth, lights on top are annoying
reviews.author: matt
reviews.content: Edit: battery life is great, medium volume and disconnecting during work, but playing music on Bluetooth constantly when not at work, it lasted 2 days.Exactly as advertised, for some reason there's two showing up on my Bluetooth pairing menu, one as a speaker the other as a headset and I can only connect to the headset one. Beyond that love the audio quality and aesthetics, feels good and solid, the knobs are smooth and I like the switch. Only thing I would change is the lights on top, they annoy me when I try to sleep
reviews.timestamp: Reviewed in the United States December 11, 2023

reviews.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Modern bluetooth speaker with a vintage look performs well.
reviews.author: Amazon Customer
reviews.content: Although somewhat heavier than one would expect from a bluetooth speaker this speaker performs. It has a large woofer and a smaller tweeter. It is reminiscent of a stereo speaker from the seventies. The speaker can be plugged in with no power brick or adapter.
reviews.timestamp: Reviewed in the United States February 17, 2024

reviews.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Excellent
reviews.author: Bassnallday
reviews.content: Just wish there wasn’t a bright led lit up on top all the time. Sound is excellent
reviews.timestamp: Reviewed in the United States July 7, 2024

reviews.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Works great, until it doesn’t.
reviews.author: Elizabeth
reviews.content: I bought this in February 2023. At first I was super excited about the sound quality, the volume, bass, and overall aesthetic. I use this at most 2-3 times per month when I’m cleaning/taking a shower. Starting 4 months ago the volume and bass nearly disappeared. I tried doing everything to problem solve- made sure my volume on my phone was maxed before connected to Bluetooth, tried using it while plugged in to see if it was a power issue, adjusted bass/treble/volume. Nothing worked. The volume now sits as high as my iPhone volume would when playing music. Occasionally, VERY occasionally the volume will magically fix and increase to what it was when I first bought the speaker. I considered there being water damage from using it in the bathroom while I shower. But I’ve always kept it covered with a towel to avoid water damage, and keep it far out of range of any water hitting it. I’ve taken extra measures to keep this thing running effectively from day 1 because I loved it so much.Please, do not waste your money, regardless of how cute and aesthetically pleasing it is. By the time it junks out on you, you won’t be eligible for a return … which is 30 days with Amazon.I haven’t tried contacting customer service for a response/replacement, but other reviews show that those efforts will come to no avail.
reviews.timestamp: Reviewed in the United States January 4, 2024

reviews.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sounds and looks great
reviews.author: Jennifer Vasquez
reviews.content: This speaker sounds and looks great! Connects fast to Bluetooth, has an on and off switch, bass and treble controls and skip button on top, and about a 20 hour battery life. Lasts me about a week and I listen about five or six hours a day. It also has a nice weight, I need two hands to move it. The sound is fills up my small kitchen well. Even my husband likes it and he’s a speaker snob. So happy with this purchase!
reviews.timestamp: Reviewed in the United States January 16, 2023

reviews.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent sound
reviews.author: Cadillacrazy
reviews.content: Heard/Saw this in a coffee shop in A small town in PA had to have it. Sounds great. Wish I could turn off the on/off announcements though.
reviews.timestamp: Reviewed in the United States August 19, 2024

reviews.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for my needs
reviews.author: Sagittarian
reviews.content: This bluetooth speaker is perfect for my needs. I needed one on my nightstand that I could listen to at night that would have a decent amount of bass without bothering the neighbors or family. There only is a slight amount of distortion when the volume is turned up too high. To remedy this, I suggest the volume be controlled through your device to achieve the best listening results. These are really well made, very hefty and very attractive to boot. I highly recommend them.
reviews.timestamp: Reviewed in the United States June 9, 2023

reviews.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Lasted just over a year
reviews.author: Jeremy
reviews.content: I loved the aesthetic of this little speaker. I mostly needed it to plug in to a record player via AUX. Having bluetooth and battery power was a nice enough but unnecessary feature for me. The reasons I rated this speaker thusly are listed below.1. The volume control has to be adjusted in the app. The knob doesn't control the full volume of the speaker, just a range within wherever you set the master volume in the app.2. After a year being plugged in all the time, it started saying "bluetooth on. bluetooth connected. bluetooth on. bluetooth connected. bluetooth..." you get the point. It wouldn't let me put it into AUX mode even after unpairing bluetooth devices.This speaker looks nice, sounds nice, and would have been just fine were it not for the awkward forced app use and the failure of the connection system.
reviews.timestamp: Reviewed in the United States May 2, 2024

reviews.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Nice vintage looking speaker but...
reviews.author: John Gould
reviews.content: I purchased due to the vintage look and good reviews of the product. I brought to use in my classic car, rather than changing out the original AM radio. It works well, the sound quality is good, and the volume is reasonable. I can hear it well and non-distorted while doing 70 Mph with the windows down, it is not a window rattler by any means. After about 8 hours of total use I noticed even when charged for days the battery will not charge to the full extent, only 75% per the indicator lights on the unit. This was an expensive piece for this to happen already. The battery has not died on me yet, but the longest I have used it without charging is about 3 hours.
reviews.timestamp: Reviewed in the United States August 11, 2023

content.product_name: Retro Wooden Bluetooth Speaker, KONEX 40W Vintage Portable Wireless Speaker, Bluetooth 4.2 Heavy Bass Music Player, 20H Long Playtime, Outdoor Speaker for Home, Office, Party, Gift for Friend

reviews.title: 2.0 out of 5 stars Doesn’t hold a charge
reviews.author: Mac
reviews.content: I first bought this because an AirBB that we stayed at had one and we were impressed with the sound quality and the looks. I bought one for our cabin home and it looks great (I got the wooden one); however, after charging 12+ hours I turned it on only to see that it has two bars of battery. Unfortunately that’s unacceptable so I have to return it.Additionally, though we have a small living space, the volume knob has to be turned up all the way (and nearly all the way on my phone as well) to get decent volume out of the thing. That means I’m not confident that it will provide a great volume of sound in an outside setting. I’ve used JBL (various models) in the past which have a much higher volume without maximizing volume on the phone.Also if you intend to use this in the evening in a dim living space or bedroom at night, be advised the battery bar on the unit is made up of several LED lights (blue and red) that blink constantly while power mode is on. They are quite bright and will be hard to ignore.Anyway, main reason I purchased is due to the athletics of the speaker, which is awesome. The wood looks very nice so I can give a star for that, but that’s it.
reviews.timestamp: Reviewed in the United States April 17, 2023

reviews.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Worked great but quickly failed :(
reviews.author: Amazon Customer
reviews.content: Features of this model are great and it can even play from a thumb drive. Really enjoyed giving this as a gift but after a couple of weeks, it wouldn't connect by Bluetooth to the computer (Windows) and also started not keeping a charge. There must be a problem in the voltage regulator circuit that would cause both problems. Amazon says that my return window is closed so I maybe stuck with a dead unit.

Being able to adjust the bass and treble is an added bonus and the knobs and hardware they used for the interface is all quality. I’ve had nothing but compliments on the thing and couldn’t be happier on the purchase! Almost forgot to mention, most importantly, it sounds great too!

reviews.title: 2.0 out of 5 stars In person it appears to be a vinyl veneer (rather than wood veneer). And battery level drops fast.
reviews.author: STW
reviews.content: Good specs and price led me to try this out because I was looking for a wood cabinet bluetooth speaker. In photos online the wood looks decent but in person, up close, it looks like a vinyl veneer. Perhaps that's why it's called "wooden" rather than "wood"?Sounds very good and fills a medium large room surprisingly well. But battery level drops awfully fast, even overnight when off.Love the metal toggle on/off switch (though it's tiny) and control knobs that look like a guitar amp. Fun design but there are better more reliable units this one seems to be copying. But if you were to get one of these, the blue and green vinyl clad versions seem a better value if this "wooden" one is vinyl veneer too.
reviews.timestamp: Reviewed in the United States April 23, 2023

reviews.content: We really like the look of this speaker, but it doesn't seem very high quality in terms of bluetooth connectivity and battery life. We end up having to charge it every other day or so and the bluetooth will often just blank out randomly. Also, if you want to use the aux connection it's basically impossible unless you turn off bluetooth on any device in range. The direction manual is fairly useless too. Bluetooth technology can sometimes be frustrating in general, and this speaker is no exception. I want to love this speaker, but really wouldn't recommend it to anyone.

reviews.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Power cord had been cut! Inoperable
reviews.author: Michael M
reviews.content: Our family was so excited to get this speaker! But the power cord it came with was CUT! The plug end (which goes into the speaker) was completely missing, and as you can see in the photo, the cord it just ruined. Cannot use the product.In addition, it's clear this item was refurbished / used, but it was sold as NEW! The carry-bag it came in was also badly torn, and the outer box was damaged. Horribly disappointing.And while the company could have sent us a replacement cord, they weren't smart enough to offer that as an option. So we're never doing business with that company again. Ridiculous!
reviews.timestamp: Reviewed in the United States December 18, 2022

reviews.title: 2.0 out of 5 stars Worked for about a month - needs to be opened up
reviews.author: Danny
reviews.content: Worked really well for about a month. Now, one of the wires inside has gone loose and I seemingly have no volume amplification. Static sound, no bass, no volume. If anyone knows how to open it up without destroying it, that’d be great.

reviews.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars NOT WORTH THE MONEY

reviews.content: This speaker worked beautifully for 5 months. Then suddenly decided to stop working. It will not connect to Bluetooth, or acknowledge that I’m flipping any switch or pushing any button on it. I can’t even get it to turn off. It’s just sitting there like a giant $130 brick with the lights still on. I’ve even reached out to the companies customer service department and have been ignored. Do not waste your money on this. It’s pretty but unfortunately that’s all it offers.
